name: Adetkio Kafkastore
description: Store clicks and in-app events to kafka

ACCESS_DOMAINS.description: Comma separator list of domains that should have access

ACCESS_EMAILS.description: Comma separated list of external emails that should have access

REDIS_POOL_SIZE.description: How many parallel connections to redis

LIBRATO_PREFIX.description: Prefix for the librato metric names

LIBRATO_USER.description: Name of the librato user, i.e. email
